duration: 3 to 12 months, renewable for an additional 12 months (total up to 24 months)
eligibility: Qualified foreign digital professionals or digital nomads.
Applicants must be either a Digital Freelancer, Independent Contractor, or Remote Worker.
For Digital Freelancers/Independent Contractors: Must have active project contract(s) with a total duration > 3 months. Clients can be both local & foreign companies.
For Remote Workers: Must have an active employment contract with a duration > 3 months. Employer must be foreign/non-Malaysian based.

Open to Tech Talent/Professionals (including Software Engineers, Backend Engineers, Cloud, Cybersecurity, Blockchain, AI, Machine Learning, Data-related fields, Digital Marketing, Digital Creative Content, Digital Content Development, User Experience, User Interface, and other related positions).

Open to Non-Tech Talent/Professionals (including Chief Executive Officer, Chief Operations Officer, Business Development (Growth Manager), Marketing Manager, Chief Financial Officer, Finance Manager/Accountant, Sales Manager, Customer Success Manager, Human Resources Manager, Legal Counsel, Public Relation Manager, Consultant, Customer Service Manager/Representative/Specialist, Communications & Public Relations Manager, Administrative Manager, Technical Writer, Tax Specialist, Tax Accountant, Production Manager, Supply Chain Manager, and other related positions).
Allowed to bring parent/parents for the main pass holder only.
Open to citizens of all nationalities except Israel.
income_requirement: More than USD 24,000 per year for Tech Talent/Professionals; More than USD 60,000 per year for Non-Tech Talent/Professionals.

steps.title: Check your eligibility
steps.description: Verify that your income, job type and nationality match the DE Rantau criteria.

steps.title: Prepare your documents
steps.description: Gather passport, contracts, income proofs and any required letters before applying online.

steps.title: Create DE Rantau portal account
steps.description: Register on the official MDEC DE Rantau portal and confirm your email.

steps.title: Submit your online application
steps.description: Fill in personal and professional details, upload all documents and review your file.

steps.title: Pay application fees
steps.description: Pay the application fees for main applicant and dependants via the portal.

steps.title: Await approval and follow-up
steps.description: MDEC reviews your application. They may request clarifications or additional documents.

required_documents.name: Passport
required_documents.description: Valid passport with at least 14 months validity from the date of application.

required_documents.name: Passport-sized photo
required_documents.description: Recent color photo following Malaysian visa photo requirements.

required_documents.name: Employment / service contract
required_documents.description: Contract with foreign employer or clients showing at least 3 months remaining.

required_documents.name: Income proof
required_documents.description: Bank statements, payslips or invoices proving the minimum annual income requirement.

required_documents.name: Police clearance / background check
required_documents.description: Clean criminal record certificate from country of origin or current residence (if required by the latest guidelines).
